directions: In a large bowl, combine lemon juice, pecans, cherries, condensed milk, and pineapple. Mix well, then gently fold in whipped topping until all ingredients are thoroughly combined.
Pour mixture into pie shells. Chill before serving. Garnish with chopped cherries and pecans if desired.
ingredients: 2 prepared 8 inch pastry shells, baked and cooled
1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained and chopped
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Millionaire Pie II
